entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please hold while we connect you with an agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I bought it online and it's just… not working for me.
I understand. Can you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's… hold on… it's bobjones@email.com.
Thank you, one moment. Okay, I see the order here. It looks like you purchased a VeloBand Pulse a few weeks ago. Is that correct?
Yes! That's the one. It's completely useless. I want to return it.
I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your VeloBand Pulse. To confirm, are you within the return policy window?
Well, how long is the return policy? I bought it maybe two weeks ago. It’s been sitting in the box, I just got around to opening it.
Our standard return policy is 90 days. You are well within that time frame. No problem at all to initiate that return.
90 days? Okay, good. So can I just send it back? I thought with this being a smart watch sort of device, it might be different.

Not a problem at all. I'll go ahead and process a return authorization for you. You'll receive an email within the next hour with a prepaid shipping label and instructions on how to return your VeloBand Pulse. Just repackage it in the original box and ship it back to us. Once we receive it, we'll issue a full refund.
Okay, great. Finally. That's all I needed. How long before I get my money back?
Typically, refunds are processed within 7 to 10 business days after we receive the returned item.
7 to 10 *business* days? Seriously? After all this hassle, I have to wait *another* two weeks to get my money back? This is ridiculous. Can I speak to a manager?

I understand your frustration. While I can document your complaint, a manager wouldn't be able to expedite the refund process any faster. It's our standard processing time. I am happy to escalate for you though.

Escalate? What good is *that* going to do? This whole thing is a joke. The VeloBand Pulse doesn’t work, and now I have to wait forever to get my money back. I should have just bought something else in the first place. I can't believe the lack of assistance! I really need to speak to your manager directly, I am not happy! Who is your manager?

I completely understand, and I am very sorry for the trouble this has caused you. Unfortunately, I can't directly transfer you to a manager at this time, but I can assure you that I'm doing everything I can on my end to make this right. Let me see if there's anything else I can do. Please hold for one moment.
Ugh….
(Silence) I am still looking over the account, is there anything else I can help you with while I continue to process this for you?
(Click)
